message.example: Demo upload completed successfully, processing started

enriched.description: Whether payload was enriched with current data

confidence.description: Average confidence score across all pages (0.0-1.0)

is_deleted.description: Computed field for API convenience: true if DeletedAt != nil

metadata.description: Optional metadata (e.g., heading level, table structure)

type.description: Block type: paragraph, heading, table, figure, caption, list, footer, header

models.JobStatus.description:
The current status of the job
example: completed

models.PageDims.description: Page dimensions in pixels. Present when available.

bounding_boxes.description: Semantic blocks with locations. Automatically included when available.

confidence.description: Confidence score from quality check (0.0-1.0). Present when quality assessment is enabled.

has_bounding_boxes.description: Whether bounding box data is available. True if bbox extraction was performed.

result.description: String for markdown, Object for structured formats. Type varies by job result_format.

error_message.description:
Error message if job failed
example: Failed to process page 5

file_name.description:
The name of the file being processed
example: quarterly_financial_report_q4.pdf

id.description:
The unique identifier of the job
example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000

processed_pages.description:
Number of pages processed so far
example: 24

processing_time.description:
Total processing time in seconds
example: 156

result_format.description:
The result format type of the job
example: structured

total_pages.description:
Total number of pages in the document
example: 24

secret.description: Always included - users need it to verify signatures

instructions.example: Extract key financial information from invoices
Extract key financial information from invoices

description.example: Updated template for processing invoice documents

instructions.example: Extract key financial information from invoices

message.example: File size exceeds your plan's limit

format.description: Option 2: Direct specification (will create template on-the-fly)

template_slug.description: Option 1: Use existing template by slug

ApiKeyAuth.description: Provide your LeapOCR API key via the `X-API-KEY` header. Example: X-API-KEY: YOUR_API_KEY
ApiKeyAuth.name: X-API-KEY

BearerAuth.description: Provide your JWT token via the `Authorization` header. Example: Authorization: Bearer <token>

info.description: Advanced OCR API for processing PDF documents with AI-powered text extraction using Gemini LLM integration. Supports structured data extraction, template-based processing, and real-time job management.
info.title: LeapOCR API

get.description: Verify JWT token from Authorization header and return complete user information including all claims and authentication details

500.description: Internal server error during token verification

get.description: Retrieve list of all available products from Polar with caching

Retrieve comprehensive system health information including database connectivity, Gemini API service status, and application performance metrics. Performs active health checks on critical system components and returns detailed status information with response times for monitoring and diagnostics purposes.

200.description: System health status retrieved successfully - all components are healthy

500.description: Internal server error during health check execution

503.description: Service unavailable - one or more critical system components are down or degraded

post.description: Public demo endpoint to get presigned URL for file upload. Supports PDF, images, and office documents. Process top 5 pages with standard-v1 model. Requires captcha verification. Supports custom instructions and schema.
post.summary: Initiate demo upload with presigned URL

get.description: Retrieve OCR processing results for a completed demo job with extracted text and structured data. Returns job status if processing is still in progress. No authentication required.

202.description: OCR processing in progress, status returned

403.description: Forbidden - job is not a demo job

404.description: Not found - job does not exist

post.description: Complete the multipart upload for a demo job and start processing. Public endpoint with optional auth.

404.description: Not Found

get.description: Retrieve a list of all enabled OCR models with their configurations, pricing, and capabilities
Retrieve OCR processing results for a completed job with extracted text and structured data. Returns job status if processing is still in progress. Supports pagination

202.description: OCR processing in progress, status returned

400.description: Bad request - invalid job ID or parameters

403.description: Forbidden - job belongs to different user

404.description: Not found - job does not exist

get.description: Retrieve current processing status and progress information for an OCR job. Shows completion status, progress percentage, and any error details

400.description: Bad request - invalid job ID format

403.description: Forbidden - job belongs to different user

404.description: Not found - job does not exist

post.description:
Create a job and generate presigned URLs for direct file upload to S3. Uses multipart upload for all files (1 part for small files, multiple parts for large files 50MB).
**Output Types:**
- `structured`: Structured data extraction. Requires either template_slug OR format (with schema)
- `markdown`: Page-by-page OCR. All configuration fields are optional
**Note:** Only one of template_slug or format can be provided per request

Create a job and start processing from a remote URL. Supported format: PDF (.pdf) only.
**Output Types:**
- `structured`: Structured data extraction. Requires either template_slug OR format (with schema)
- `markdown`: Page-by-page OCR. All configuration fields are optional
**Note:** Only one of template_slug or format can be provided per request
Complete a direct upload by providing all uploaded part ETags

404.description: Not Found
